titleStmt.title: SII 14.218: original edition by A. S. Ramanatha Ayyar
No. 218. (A.R. No. 66 of 1929.) ŚIVAPURI, TIRUPPATTUR TALUK, RAMANATHAPURAM DISTRICT. ON THE BELT OF THE VERANDAH IN THE FIRST prākāra, SVAYAMPRAKĀŚA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This record dated in the 8th year of Tribhuvanachakravartin Śrīvallabhadēva has to be assigned to this king Jaṭāvarmaṉ Śrīvallabha. It registers that Danadaṉ-Pagaiveṉṟa-kaṇḍaṉ alias Tuvarāpativēḷāṉ made a gift of land by name Añjādakaṇḍa-Nāvalkuḷam by purchase, for the kitchen expenses of the temple at Tiruttāṉdōṉṟīśvaram-Uḍaiyār at Nṛipaśēkhara-chaturvēdimaṅgalam, a brahmadēya in Kēraḷaśiṅgavaḷanāḍu.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svastiśrī . tribhuvanacakravattikaḷ civallatevaṟkku yāṇṭu 8vatu keraḷaciṅka vaḷanāṭṭu brahmateca nṛpacekara caturvedimaṅkalattu tiruttāṉtoṉṟicuramuṭai yāṟku
taṉatan pakaiveṉṟakaṇṭanāna tuvarāpati veḷānen Ittevaṟkku tirumaṭaippaḷḷi puṟamāka Iṟaikaḻittu kuṭutta nilamāvatu . curavināṭṭu pāṇṭaṅkuṭi veḷḷārkaḷil ciṟaikaṇṭaṉ peṟṟā
ṉuḷḷiṭṭār pakkalum Uyyaniṉṟāṭuvār pakkalum Ittevar Āticaṇṭeśvarar tirunāmattāl vilaikoṇṭa Añcātakaṇṭa nāvalkuḷam vaḷaiyil cuṟṟu muṟṟilum Uḷḷa puñce nañceyu maṟṟu Eṟppeṟpaṭṭanavu miṟai kaḻittu kuṭutten taṉatan pakaiveṉṟa kaṇṭanāna tuvarāpativeḷānen . Itu panmmāheśvara rakṣai .
Digital edition of SII 14.218 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
